attributes.action: GIVE LOCAL AUTHORITY MORE POWERS TO TACKLE ANTISOCIAL BEHAVIOUR TO PREVENT THE VICTIMS OF THIS CRIME HAVING TO LEAVE THEIR HOMES eg MANAGEMENT TRANSFERS. SUCH POWERS BEING TO AUTOMATICALLY GIVE SHORT SCOTTISH SECURE TENANCY TO PEOPLE WITH KNOWN ANTISOCIAL BEHAVIOUR.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I CANNOT LIVE IN MY HOME FOR FEAR OF AN ANTISOCIAL TENANT THE DUNDEE CITY COUNCIL KNEW OF HIS BEHAVIOUR BEFORE THEY GAVE HIM THE TENANCY LEAVING ME TO REPORT HIM TO THE POLICE AND AS A RESULT THEIR IS AN ON GOING COURT CASE BECAUSE HE HAS BROKEN HIS ANTISOCIAL BEHAVIOUR ORDER. I FEEL THAT IF THE COUNCIL HAD GIVEN HIM A SHORT SCOTTISH SECURE TENANCY WHEN HE MOVED HOUSE I WOULD NOT HAVE TO LEAVE MY HOME FOR FEAR OF HIM. I HAVE BEEN OFFERED A MANAGEMENT TRANSFER BUT I FEEL I SHOULD NOT BE THE ONE TO LEAVE MY HOME

rejection.details: Please re-submit without using BLOCK CAPS as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
